CmdLine: apk add --no-cache tini git graphviz make unzip zlib-dev libzip-dev     && apk add --no-cache --virtual build-deps autoconf file g++ gcc libc-dev pkgconf re2c     && git clone https://github.com/nikic/php-ast.git     && cd php-ast     && phpize     && ./configure && make && make install     && cd .. && rm -rf php-ast     && docker-php-ext-enable ast     && docker-php-ext-install zip pcntl     && echo "date.timezone=UTC" >> "$PHP_INI_DIR/php.ini"     && echo "memory_limit=-1" >> "$PHP_INI_DIR/php.ini"     && echo "phar.readonly=0" >> "$PHP_INI_DIR/php.ini"     && mkdir -p "${TOOLBOX_TARGET_DIR}"     && curl -Ls "https://github.com/jakzal/toolbox/releases/download/v${TOOLBOX_VERSION}/toolbox.phar"          -o "${TOOLBOX_TARGET_DIR}/toolbox"     && chmod +x "${TOOLBOX_TARGET_DIR}/toolbox"     && php "${TOOLBOX_TARGET_DIR}/toolbox" install --exclude-tag "exclude-php:7.2"     && rm -rf "${COMPOSER_HOME}/cache"     && apk del --purge -r build-deps
Commands.Name: run
